name: Recoil Rumble
description:
Survive while your gun works against you. Recoil Rumble is a top-down shooter game where your gun is constantly propelling you backwards. While your gun is your only source of damage and movement, it also can lead you to your death. 

This game was developed for Mini Jam 111, and was completed in just under 72 hours.

Music:

Fall by Studio Meow Meow (CC BY) https://thricedotted.itch.io/looptober-2021-variety-pack

Energizer Cult by VOiD1 Gaming
